name: Astro Ninja Man DX
overview: Flashy screen! Furious music! Exhilarating shooting game! Ninjas make an outstanding performance in space! Because they are ninjas, they are alter ego! Ninja swords are strong! Astro Ninja Man! Memories UT People & Places Favorites Automatic firing for easy operation! Enjoy the screen and music that pushes the limits of 8-bit expression!
